nodes.text: Daywings were a species of insect found on the Mid Rim planet Qiilura. Notable for their extremely short lifespan, daywings hatched in the morning and died by the evening. The ruby– and sapphire–colored insects were found on the Braan River and other small standing bodies of water on Qiilura in 22 BBY.
Daywings first appeared in the 2004 novel Republic Commando: Hard Contact, written by Karen Traviss.
